CustomField.inlineHelpText: * Currently in Use: To indicate this technology is currently in use at the customer site * Future Consideration: To indicate if they are considering future purchase of competitive technology. For what reason(s)? Future use should consider next 1-2 years * No Longer in Use: To indicate when this technology was previously in use at the customer site. * Unknown: To catch all for any other scenario we would like to track for awareness that doesn't fit into any of the other options
